coating.title: DLC Nanoparticle Coating
coating.description: Our proprietary carbon nanoparticle coating delivers unmatched edge hardness and sharpness. The mirror finish creates superior glide while the coating prevents deburring during sharpening.

precision.title: Precision Manufacturing
precision.description: Each blade is crafted from verified stainless steel with profiling tolerance of ~0.001". This ensures perfect consistency between pairs for optimal balance and performance.

frequency.title: Sharpening Frequency
frequency.description: Thanks to the DLC coating, our blades require sharpening 50% less often than standard blades. Most players sharpen every 15-20 hours of ice time.

warranty.title: 1-Year Warranty
warranty.description: All JRZ Pro Black DLC blades come with a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects. This covers coating issues, structural integrity, and profile consistency.

returns.title: 30-Day Returns
returns.description: Not completely satisfied? Return unused blades within 30 days for a full refund. Blades must be in original condition with no mounting or sharpening marks.
